about_the_game:
About the game

◆Note
All text in the game is translated by machine translation.


◆Story◆
　Daisuke Tomigo, a young man who has made a huge fortune, has been drinking and playing with women for a long time, and he starts targeting "married women" for more stimulation.
　He invests a large sum of money to build a condominium and preys on the married women who move in one after another.
　One day, two beautiful married women move into the apartment.

　The new wife, Kasumi Terauchi, has a fresh G-cup body and a cheerful personality, and does not know how to doubt people.
　Mimori Yazaki is a veteran housewife with a J-cup ripe body and an air of a Japanese caress.

I will impregnate these wives and make them mine.
　The protagonist, who has set his sights on these attractive wives, puts his plan into action to make them his property.




Character Introduction

A cheerful new wife who doesn't know when to be suspicious.

.
Name: Kasumi Terauchi
Height: 160 cm
Three sizes：B93 (G cup)/W58/H89

A new wife who has been married for less than six months who has moved into the apartment where the main character lives.
Her husband is a system engineer for a major IT company.
She hopes to have a child soon, but her husband is opposed to the idea due to their young age and economic reasons.
She is often seen as a cool beauty because of her appearance, but she has a gentle and kind personality.
She is a strong person who can handle household chores without a hitch, but she loves pretty things and is often careless, and her young age makes her a bit of a clunker.
Her fresh and attractive body, which is very attractive to men, gives off an air of a woman who is likely to give birth to many healthy children.



A veteran housewife who has been married for 10 years and is suffering from infertility.

.
Name: Mimori Yazaki
Height: 153 cm
Three sizes：B110 (J cup)/W68/H96

A veteran housewife of 10 years who moved into the apartment after Mr. and Mrs. Terauchi.
She exudes a motherly atmosphere and has a calm and gentle personality.
She does not like to stand out and is reserved in everything she does, but she does what needs to be done. She is a somewhat old-fashioned, Yamato Nadeshiko-like woman.
She married her husband through an arranged marriage. She has had sex with many people in proportion to her age, but she is very chaste, and her husband is the only person with whom she has had sexual intercourse.
She has been married for 10 years, but has not been blessed with a child, and is worried that the distance between her and her husband is beginning to widen.
Mimori herself is not very happy with her own body, which she considers to be sloppy and unattractive.



Japanese voice is included.



Game Specifications

Novel game with click to read.
Heroine's full voice
CG mode
CG mode ・Scene recollection

◆Content warning

This game contains content not suitable for all ages,
may not be suitable for display in the workplace.

game contains nudity or sexual content and general adult content.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace.
Nudity or sexual content, general adult content

This game contains the following content

Sex without consent
Extreme play
Sex with pregnant women


These acts may be a crime.
Do not imitate them.

All characters are over 20 years old.

  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound

short_description: The main character builds a condominium in order to have a married woman as his object of desire, Two beautiful wives become his targets.They get close to married women, make them drown in the pleasures of sex, and impregnate them with the seed of a child other than their husbands' into their wombs!
